Good tennis data exist, but visualizations to interpret these data are lacking. Here is a [gallery of plots](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1iIzTuu3-laCiinfauWEYW4_7PF934M50fm3q34eFx2Y/edit?usp=sharing) that I will continually update as I try and provide data driven answers to some interesting tennis questions.
